doc.base: base optimizer configuration for unet and text encoder
doc.text_encoder_lr_scale: if LR not set on text encoder, sets the Lr to a multiple of the Base LR. for example, if base `lr` is 2e-6 and `text_encoder_lr_scale` is 0.5, the text encoder's LR will be set to `1e-6`.
doc.optimizer_desc: 'adamw' in standard 32bit, 'adamw8bit' is bitsandbytes, 'lion' is lucidrains
doc.lr: learning rate, if null will use CLI or main JSON config value
doc.lr_warmup_steps: number of steps to warmup LR to target LR, if null will use CLI or default a value based on max epochs
doc.lr_decay_steps: number of steps to decay LR to zero for cosine, if null will use CLI or default a value based on max epochs
doc.betas: exponential decay rates for the moment estimates
doc.epsilon: value added to denominator for numerical stability, unused for lion
doc.unfreeze_last_n_layers: if not null, freeze all parameters in the text encoder except for the last n layers and the final layer norm
